thirdPartyId.title: Third-party Add-on Id
thirdPartyId.description: The identifier of the third party add-on which will override the app provided one. Should be of the format example@foo

overridesId.title: Add-on Id to Override
overridesId.description: The identifier of the app-provided add-on to be overridden. Should be of the format example@search.mozilla.org

urls.title: URLs
urls.description: An array of URL sets which must be matched (with the add-on's manifest settings) to allow the override
